title: Ticket #6748: Suppress Schedd messages irrelvant for CEs
description:
HTCondor-CE's don't manage any worker nodes and therefore do not need to run a negotiator. It would be nice if we could completely suppress the following messages since it confuses admins that are troubleshooting:

  • 08/29/18 11:30:31 Sending RESCHEDULE command to negotiator(s)
  • 08/29/18 10:38:04 Number of Active Workers 0
  • 08/29/18 10:38:43 Can't find address for negotiator
  • 08/29/18 10:38:43 Failed to send RESCHEDULE to unknown daemon:

TJ says that by default, every job submission sends a RESCHEDULE so he suggested setting SUBMIT_SEND_RESCHEDULE = False to limit the related messages so that they only occur on SCHEDD_INTERVAL
creator: blin
